author: Whitney Medworth
title: LeBron James rips ‘trash’ rumors about a Kevin Love-Carmelo Anthony trade
text:
Candid LeBron James is always a good thing
On Monday night there was a rumor that LeBron James was willing to part ways with Kevin Love if Carmelo Anthony was coming to Cleveland. Then the Cavaliers won in overtime against the Wizards and Kevin Love has his best game of the season. He scored 39 points, had 12 rebounds, and was exactly what the Cavaliers needed all night long.
LeBron hasn’t been shy about speaking his mind this season so he did not hold back when addressing the rumors after the win. “It’s trash and the guy that wrote it is trash too. For writing that, especially during the game like that,” said LeBron after the game. You can hear his full comments below.
LeBron said he learned about the rumor after the game and that he trusts the front office to fix the team if they need it. What a month its been for LeBron James and the Cavaliers.
